pr_title: TDI-43935 : MsSQLRow NString type for prepared statement

timeline.message: TDI-43935 : MsSQLRow NString type for prepared statement

timeline.bodyText: Strange, this lis is a java type list. NString is a SQL type.
timeline.author: ypiel-talend
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -298,6 +298,7 @@
         		<ITEM NAME="Object" 		VALUE="Object"/>
         		<ITEM NAME="Short" 			VALUE="Short"/>
         		<ITEM NAME="String" 		VALUE="String"/>
+                <ITEM NAME="NString"        VALUE="NString"/>

replies.bodyText:
Ok it is the end of the jdbc method getXxxx : 
  
    
      tdi-studio-se/main/plugins/org.talend.designer.components.localprovider/components/templates/DB/Row/AbstractDBRowMain.javajet
    
    
         Line 107
      in
      cb8285f
    
    
    
    

        
          
           pstmt_<%=cid %>.set<%=param.get("PARAMETER_TYPE")%>(<%=param.get("PARAMETER_INDEX")%>,<%=param.get("PARAMETER_VALUE")%>);
replies.author: ypiel-talend

replies.bodyText: Yes, not the cleanest way to do it, but it works.
